attributes.action: stop the increase of National Insurance Contributions for middle income families
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has been announced today, yet again, how working class families are targeted and as a result will be paying more than £500 a year in NIC. Public sector will feel it also, especially after such a battle to get our payrises in a first place! Please move the upper limit of rise from £40000 to more than £60000. Thank you.
